replies.body: This is being looked into, but may be starting to clear up now.  Our network folks are tracking the issue in this[ incident thread](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/live-incident-breakdown-na/HLBQzvEa-1121-patching-issues?show=flat).  Hang tight!
Mine didn't patch at all it just allowed me to log in its okay right?

You may be in the clear!  Keep an eye on the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page to be safe.  Keep in mind, though, that you can still log in but need to patch.  You'll see a % on the top left where Play usually is.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=AsulFubp,comment-id=000700000000,timestamp=2017-11-21T21:41:35.300+0000)
>
> You may be in the clear!  Keep an eye on the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page to be safe.  Keep in mind, though, that you can still log in but need to patch.  You'll see a % on the top left where Play usually is.

Btw as a result of this issue a lan party of 50 people was canceled lol 
But we are good just a two hours too late :)
Am on EUNE i thought only my region had this
for me it just tells me to install the game. it doesnt even give me a chance to patch

> [{quoted}](name=basketbunch,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=AsulFubp,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2017-11-21T21:03:29.971+0000)
>
> for me it just tells me to install the game. it doesnt even give me a chance to patch

Same for me
I know this wasn't intetional, but seriously, this isn't ok. I have very limited data and had to download a 1.5 GB patch because of this. I'm going to have to be careful about my usage for the rest of the month now, because of this.
